div.p: RB MSS M108a, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.
Algae in Champion-bay a Spalding lectae sub 21/7 a Bar. Ferd. v. Mueller mihi missae 1891 .

Algae collected in Champion-bay
WA.
by Spalding sent to me on 21/7 by Baron Ferd. v. Mueller 1891.

div.p: Algae ex Preservation Island (Bass Str.) ab E. Maclaine lectae, sub 1/6 91 a Bar. Mueller mihi missae .
Algae collected from Preservation Island (Bass Str.) by E. Maclaine, sent to me on 1/6 91 by Baron Mueller.
Algae ex Port Stevens ab Aug. Rudder lectae, sub 10/7 a Bar. Ferd. de Mueller mihi missae 1891 .

Algae collected from Port Stevens
Port Stephens, NSW?
by Aug. Rudder, sent to me on 10/7 by Baron Ferd. von Mueller 1891.

cell.p:
polydactylis J Ag. (M. flabellata
Melanthalia flabellata is listed without description in Sonder (1880), p. 22, but was apparently not otherwise published: see AlgaeBase (accessed 13 September 2020). Sond.?)

div.p: Ich bin nicht gewiss über folgende Sendung berichtet zu haben:
I am not certain I have reported on the following sending:
Algae ex Bluff Novae Zelandiae sub mense martii 1891 receptae, collectore non indicato .
Algae from Bluff New Zealand received in the month of March 1891, collector not indicated.
